entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
